## Thesis

::: {.publication}
**Master's Thesis - "Deep Learning Approaches for Time Series Forecasting"**

*University Name*, 2019

Advisor: Prof. Advisor Name

[PDF](papers/masters-thesis.pdf)

**Abstract** - This thesis explores the application of deep learning techniques, including LSTM and Transformer architectures, for time series forecasting tasks. We demonstrate significant improvements over traditional statistical methods across multiple real-world datasets.

:::
